page.title: 08A SMALL FARMER IN BURWELL.
page.content: Having farmed for 36 years here, he owns 30 acres of which 20 are fields. He{started farming at 30.}He grows cereal crops,beans and sugar-beet.Last harvest he produced 3000 bales of straw (1 bale in 1985 worth 25p). His{machine agents}are David Brown and{Mitchams of Burwell.}He has a combine,2 tractors,a seed-drill, reversible and common ploughs and 2 harrows. {Buildings}include a barn,work-shed,and 6 implement sheds together with an old and new piggery.. He uses{compound fertilizer}and pig muck as the land is potash deficient. His{50 pigs}are sold as{weaners}to be fattened.He has to feed-up at 8am and 4pm.3-day old pigs have iron and anti- biotics to stop scour.His{vet}comes {from Soham.
